netif Struct Reference

#include <netif.h>

Detailed Description

generic data structure used for all lwIP network interfaces

Definition at line 66 of file netif.h.

err_t(* netif::input)(struct pbuf *p, struct netif *inp)
 

This function is called by the network device driver to pass a packet up the TCP/IP stack.

Referenced by ethernetif_input(), loopif_output(), and netif_add().

struct ip_addr netif::ip_addr
 

IP address configuration in network byte order

Definition at line 73 of file netif.h.

Referenced by dhcp_create_request(), etharp_arp_input(), etharp_ip_input(), etharp_output(), etharp_query(), ethernetif_output(), ip_output_if(), and netif_set_ipaddr().

err_t(* netif::linkoutput)(struct netif *netif, struct pbuf *p)
 

This function is called by the ARP module when it wants to send a packet on the interface. This function outputs the pbuf as-is on the link medium.

Referenced by etharp_arp_input(), etharp_query(), ethernetif_init(), and update_arp_entry().

u8_t netif::num

Definition at line 105 of file netif.h.

err_t(* netif::output)(struct netif *netif, struct pbuf *p, struct ip_addr *ipaddr)
 

This function is called by the IP module when it wants to send a packet on the interface. This function typically first resolves the hardware address, then sends the packet.

Referenced by ethernetif_init(), ip_frag(), ip_output_if(), loopif_init(), and slipif_init().

void* netif::state
 

This field can be set by the device driver and could point to state information for the device.

Definition at line 91 of file netif.h.

Referenced by ethernetif_init(), ethernetif_input(), ethernetif_output(), low_level_init(), netif_add(), slipif_init(), slipif_input(), and slipif_output().
